name: The Great Fleece (Rusben Guzman)
description:
The Great Fleece is a stealth, point & click adventure game with engaging cutscenes created with Timeline & Cinemachine. I used assets provided by GameDevHQ for the development of the game.

I created all the mechanics and functionalities like AI Patrol, Click to point movement, Custom Cutscenes, Animation, Cinematic Camera Movement, Voice Over Track as well the UI, Lighting and Material Settings.
